question: Who inaugurated the test track facility for the Automotive OEM?
explanation: Union Heavy Industries & Public Enterprises Minister Shri Anant G. Geete inaugurated the test track facility for the Automotive Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) at Oragadam, Chennai. The facility is developed by The Global Automotive Research Centre (GARC) Chennai, a body working under the NATRiP (National Automotive Testing & R&D Infra Project).
